messages.subject: Fanfic Update:  "Three," Chapter 7 - [Ken/Kao/Sai lemon]
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, everyone! I ve just posted Chapter 7 of Three, a lemon featuring a threesome between Kenshin, Kaoru, and Saitou:
messages.messageBody:
Hi, everyone!

I've just posted Chapter 7 of "Three," a lemon featuring a threesome between
Kenshin, Kaoru, and Saitou:

http://adultfan.nexcess.net/aff/story.php?no=544174017&chapter=7

I'm always trying to improve my writing (and right now, and focusing heavily
on characterization); any suggestions for improvement that you might have
would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks, and best wishes for 2005!

Kalli
